changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.job AS SELECT base_table.id, s.name AS service, p.name AS product, at.name AS assign_to, r.name AS requester, dt.name AS deliver_to, df.name AS deliver_from, sc.name AS status, base_table.parent, base_table.sequence_number, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.update_date FROM job base_table JOIN product s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN product p ON base_table.product = p.id JOIN agency at ON base_table.assign_to = at.id JOIN agency r ON base_table.requester = r.id JOIN location dt ON base_table.deliver_to = dt.id JOIN location df ON base_table.deliver_from = df.id JOIN status_code sc ON base_table.status = sc.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.job OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.job TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.job TO core_read_write; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.job TO core_read_only;
